t: Naked Fusion Resin
s: Mix thoroughly until cloudiness goes away and epoxy is clear. Pour into clean container and mix again for 1 min. Thats it, fool proof. Use a low propane torch to pop micro bubbles after pour and at 20 min. Naked Fusion customer service is also very helpful and friendly .
